messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: In the early hours of the morning, Detective Marissa O'Connell and her partner, Sergeant Jack Brennan, arrived at the chaotic crime scene. The front door had been smashed in, evidencing a forced entry. As they moved deeper into the residence, they noted multiple signs of struggle. Officer Mateo Ramirez was already on the scene, taking statements from the visibly shaken neighbors. Technician Emily Watson was crouched over a shattered lamp, meticulously collecting potential fingerprints, while Patrol Officer George Clark directed the gathering crowd away from the area. Meanwhile, Deputy Coroner Dr. Samuel Hayes was examining the body, declaring time of death to be approximately 2 hours prior to their arrival. In an adjacent room, Criminalist Dr. Henry Liu was analyzing blood spatter patterns. The situation was further complicated when a call came over the radio from Officer Jane Phillips, who reported that a suspicious individual had been spotted fleeing the area shortly after the incident. A second team, including Lieutenant Cara Stevens and Captain Rick Donovan, was dispatched to assist in a search of the vicinity. As the investigation continued, Technician Mark Roberts arrived to assist Watson with the collection of evidence. Coroner's Assistant Dr. Naomi Fisher was seen discussing the preliminary findings with Dr. Hayes. At the corner, Officer Miguel Santos was taking notes, and close by, the seasoned Criminalist Dr. Erica Johnson was piecing together the sequence of events that led to the untimely demise.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Marissa O'ConnellOfficer Context: Arrived at the chaotic crime scene with her partner, Sergeant Jack Brennan, and observed signs of forced entry and struggle.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Sergeant Jack BrennanOfficer Context: Partner of Detective Marissa O'Connell, arrived at the crime scene together.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Mateo RamirezOfficer Context: Was already on the scene, taking statements from neighbors.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Technician Emily WatsonOfficer Context: Was collecting potential fingerprints from a shattered lamp.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Patrol Officer George ClarkOfficer Context: Directed the gathering crowd away from the crime scene area.Officer Role: Patrol OfficerOfficer Name: Deputy Coroner Dr. Samuel HayesOfficer Context: Examined the body and declared the time of death.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Criminalist Dr. Henry LiuOfficer Context: Analyzing blood spatter patterns in an adjacent room.Officer Role: CriminalistOfficer Name: Officer Jane PhillipsOfficer Context: Reported a suspicious individual fleeing the area shortly after the incident.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Lieutenant Cara StevensOfficer Context: Part of the second team dispatched to assist in a search of the vicinity.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Captain Rick DonovanOfficer Context: Part of the second team dispatched to assist Lieutenant Cara Stevens in a search of the vicinity.Officer Role: CaptainOfficer Name: Technician Mark RobertsOfficer Context: Arrived to assist Technician Emily Watson with the collection of evidence.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Coroner's Assistant Dr. Naomi FisherOfficer Context: Discussed preliminary findings with Deputy Coroner Dr. Samuel Hayes.Officer Role: Coroner's AssistantOfficer Name: Officer Miguel SantosOfficer Context: Taking notes at the corner of the crime scene.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Criminalist Dr. Erica JohnsonOfficer Context: Was piecing together the sequence of events leading to the demise.Officer Role: Criminalist
